name: backbone.nativeajax
author: Adam Krebs <amk528@cs.nyu.edu>
description: A Backbone.Ajax function powered by native XHR methods

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch -m 'Backbone.NativeAjax %s' && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor -m 'Backbone.NativeAjax %s' && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major -m 'Backbone.NativeAjax %s' && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
